subheader: OpenWar is the unofficial open source successor to the browser game "freewar.com".
introduction_text: OpenWar is a free roleplay browsergame with a medieval fantasy setting. You can explore the world, fight monsters, complete quests, trade with other players and much more. Register now and start your adventure!

register.name: Character name:
register.name-small: This name will be shown ingame
register.password-too-short: Password too short, must be at least 8 characters long
register.password-too-simple: Password too simple, must match at least 3 of the following criteria: uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number, special character
register.charname_too_short: Character name too short, must be at least 1 characters long
register.charname_too_long: Character name too long, must be at most 16 characters long
